breakfast.name: Creamy Polenta with Roasted Vegetables
ingredients: Assorted roasted vegetables (e.g., bell peppers, zucchini, eggplant)
breakfast.preparation: Cook polenta according to package directions using vegetable broth. Stir in nutritional yeast for cheesy flavor. Roast vegetables with olive oil, salt, and pepper until tender. Top polenta with roasted vegetables and fresh basil.
breakfast.nutritionalBenefits: Provides complex carbohydrates for energy, fiber for digestion, and vitamins and minerals from vegetables.  Polenta is easily digestible and gentle on the liver.
breakfast.healthNotes: Choose low-sodium vegetable broth to reduce sodium intake.  Roasting vegetables enhances their sweetness and digestibility.

lunch.name: Lentil Bolognese with Whole Wheat Pasta
lunch.preparation: Cook pasta according to package directions. Sauté onion, garlic, carrot, and celery in olive oil. Add lentils, crushed tomatoes, vegetable broth, and Italian herbs. Simmer until lentils are tender. Season with salt and pepper. Serve lentil bolognese over pasta.
lunch.nutritionalBenefits: High in protein and fiber from lentils, provides complex carbohydrates from pasta, and rich in antioxidants from tomatoes and herbs.  Lentils are a good source of iron, which is important for vegans. Easily digestible.
lunch.healthNotes: Limit the amount of olive oil used. Use whole wheat pasta to increase fiber intake.

dinner.name: Vegan Risotto with Asparagus and Peas
ingredients: White wine (optional, alcohol should evaporate during cooking)
dinner.preparation: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil. Add Arborio rice and toast lightly. Deglaze with white wine (if using). Gradually add vegetable broth, stirring constantly, until rice is creamy and cooked through. Stir in asparagus, peas, and nutritional yeast. Season with salt and pepper.
dinner.nutritionalBenefits: Provides carbohydrates for energy, vitamins and minerals from asparagus and peas, and a creamy texture from the Arborio rice.  This is a filling meal that is easy on the digestive system.
dinner.healthNotes: Using a good quality vegetable broth is important for flavor.  Cook the risotto slowly and patiently for the best results. The use of alcohol is optional and can be omitted.

snacks.name: Almond Milk Smoothie with Banana and Spinach
snacks.preparation: Blend all ingredients together until smooth.
snacks.nutritionalBenefits: Provides protein, fiber, and vitamins and minerals.  The smoothie is quick, easily digested, and packed with nutrients.
snacks.healthNotes: Adjust the amount of almond milk to achieve desired consistency. Ensure the protein powder is liver-friendly, avoiding high doses of additives and artificial sweeteners.
